home1.message1: is an image recognition program developed by CLINICAGRO, designed to find truly MADE IN CAMEROON products which remains a tedious task.
home1.message2: allows you to search for what you see, to go faster, to geolocate with precision the Made In Cameroon products displayed in the country's supermarkets.
home1.message3: We give you access to the following information:
home1.message4: the address of the supermarkets where you will find these products
home1.message5: the positioning of these products in supermarkets;
home1.message6: the mileage and the price to access these supermarkets in relation to your position.
home1.message7: Simply register with a WHATSAPP number to access all this information from an image or a word.

register.whatsapp_not_installed: Make sure you have installed whatsapp
register.phone_bad: please enter a whatsapp number with country code (237). for example: 237696960054
register.message1: Welcome to * LOUSSI *, your account has been perfectly created !!!
register.message2: * LOUSSI * is an image recognition program developed by CLINICAGRO, designed to find truly * MADE IN CAMEROON * products
register.message4: LOUSSI allows you to search for what you see, to go faster, to geolocate with precision the Made In Cameroon products displayed in the country's supermarkets.
register.phone_exist: This phone number is already in our database
register.infos: Your access will be sent to you by whatsapp.

forgetpass.message1: Welcome to * LOUSSI *, your password has been updated !!!

recherche_text.enable_gps: Activate your location service to allow Loussi to determine your location in order to provide you with the coordinates of the nearest supermarket.
recherche_text.place_of_product: Where can I find this product?
recherche_text.opinion_valid: Your opinion has been taken into account
recherche_text.infos_avis: Tell the entrepreneur what you think of his product. Would you recommend it and why?
recherche_text.field_avis: Please give your opinion before validating

whatsapp.message7: Location of the product in the supermarket: *

boutiques.product_not_register: This product is not referenced in any supermarket for the moment.
